==Useful Info==
'''Octopodes''' are sentient octopuses, usually armed with [[polearms]] and wearing [[hat]]s. They are capable of dealing moderate damage with their [[constriction]] melee attacks, but are otherwise very fragile. They can be found very rarely in [[the Abyss]].

==Tips & Tricks==
None needed.
